title: Micro-ondes Frigidaire FGBM19WNVF

Fridge Microwave FGBM19WNVF ‚Äì 110V ‚Äì with integrated hood

The FGBM19WNVF Frigidaire is a high-end microwave oven with integrated hood, combining modern design, power and practicality. Ideal for equipping your kitchen at Saint Martin (SXM), it easily installs above the stove and allows tooptimize space while ensuring efficient ventilation.

Thanks to its generous capacity of 34 litres and its power of 1000 watts, this model guarantees fast, homogeneous and silent cooking. Its touch electronic controls, sound clear digital screen and its automatic programs facilitate the preparation of all your dishes on a daily basis.

The stainless steel finish elegant and resistant fits perfectly into the modern or professional kitchens. Designed for local electrical installations, this microwave works in 110 volts, ideal for the homes of Saint Martin and the Caribbean.
